schema.description: Only with "enumerable" extension Returns all accounts that have balances. Supports pagination. Return type: AllAccountsResponse.
schema.title: All accounts

ui-schema.ui:title: All Accounts
ui-schema.ui:description: Retrieve a list of all accounts which have a balance. Use pagination to manage the results.

ui:options.title: Query All Accounts
ui:options.description: Retrieve a list of all accounts which have a balance. Supports pagination to manage the results.

alerts.text: A maximum of 30 results can be returned in one request.

ui:options.title: Result Limit
ui:options.description: Set the maximum number of accounts to be retrieved in one request. Leave blank for default limit.
ui:options.help: If left empty, a default limit of 10 results will be applied. Values greater than 30 will default to the maximum of 30 results.

ui:options.title: Start After Account
ui:options.description: Specify an account address to begin listing the next set of accounts in the pagination.
ui:options.help: Enter an account address to start listing accounts after it. Useful for pagination.
